entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Low Read High Write Counter #92442
  • CborWriter should use doubling for buffer growth #92425
    9.0.0
  • SizeConverter is trying to convert even before verifying the value could be converted #92424
    9.0.0
  • [8.0] Connection reset assert failure in System.Net.Sockets.Tests.SendReceive_SyncForceNonBlocking.TcpReceiveSendGetsCanceledByDispose #92423
    8.0.0
  • [8.0] coreclr test failure: readytorun_GenericCycleDetection._Depth3Test_Depth3Test_._Depth3Test_Depth3Test_sh() #92420
    8.0.0
  • [8.0] [mono] Assert failed in ConsolePal.GetBufferInfo #92417
    8.0.0
  • libsosplugin cannot be loaded into lldb (macos arm64) #92416
  • [wasm] Add a workload validation step to `dotnet/emsdk` #92415
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: ConfigureAwaitOptions.TimeSensitive #92412
  • Strange issues when mixing [UnmanagedCallersOnly] with [DLLImport] - "Method's type signature is not PInvoke compatible" emitted for incorrect methods #92409
  • .NET runtime crashes sometimes during stack unwinding on Linux arm64 #92408
  • Missing *LeftHanded Equivalents in System.Numerics.Matrix4x4 #92402
  • [browser] __arg_return.ToJS(__retVal); is generated twice in JSExport #92400
    8.0.0
  • TypeDescriptor.GetProperties(object instance) is not thread-safe #92394
    Future
  • HTTP/3: Hang when reading content or disposing response when SerializeToStreamAsync doesn't complete #92390
    9.0.0

Closed

  • runtime-nativeaot-outerloop started to run by default on PR's #92432
  • Enable incremental package builds for RPM and DEB - on dev machines #32304
    Future
  • Fix a requirement to add individual versions of libicu in Debian deps package #43419
    8.0.0
  • Are there any support materials for a convenient .NET compilation with build.sh? #48240
    Future
  • After updating to 5.0.200-1 using package manager, it appears that no sdks are installed. #49375
    6.0.x
  • dotnet-sdk deps installing from Fedora 33 Updates repo instead of Microsoft repo #49379
    8.0.0
  • Add additional `ThrowIf[CONDITION]` to more exceptions #92370
  • AggressiveOptimization makes wrong Vector256 optimization in .NET8 RC1 #92328
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json: `JsonIgnoreCondition.WhenWritingNull` is not working #92383
  • Serialization not working as expected #92404
  • [browser] setModuleImports() can only be used once? #92386
    8.0.0
  • Precompiling failed error after enabling LLVM on Android release builds #92031
    8.0.0
  • Regex Escape Sequence inconsistency in C# compared to C++ and VBScript #92379
  • Port CoreCLR PAL to linux-riscv64 #75749
    Future
  • [wasm] [debugger] Evaluation of methods on enums #69299
    9.0.0
  • New LINQ CountBy/AggregateBy tests are failing on native aot #92397
  • Test failure _Vector128_ro::JIT.HardwareIntrinsics.General._Vector128.Program.LessThanOrEqualAnySingle() #92201
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Stop setting separate properties for BUNDLE_PROBE, HOSTPOLICY_EMBEDDED, PINVOKE_OVERRIDE #92448
    area-Host
  • `IDispatch` should accept `HRESULT` as valuetype #92447
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Explicitly clear DOTNET_BUNDLE_EXTRACT_BASE_DIR in tests that expect it is not set #92446
    area-Single-File
  • Re-enable TestCallingConventions for x86 GCStress #92445
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-rc2] Do not call SignalSession on invalid session IDs #92444
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Use the native cross compilers on win-arm64 #92443
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/8.0-rc2] Make HostModel PEUtils always read/write little endian #92441
    Servicing-approved, area-HostModel, 8.0.0
  • Improve getExactClasses to support classes as base types #92440
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-rc2] [browser] Fix SIMD+EH check #92439
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Don't produce a NuGet package for the PGO variant of the runtime pack #92438
    blocking-official-build, area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [release/8.0-rc2] Address feedback and fix some TensorPrimitives issues #92437
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] Fix chrome update script to use 'chromium dash', instead of 'omahaproxy' #92436
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Improve CborWriter buffer growth #92435
    area-System.Formats.Cbor, community-contribution
  • Do not call SignalSession on invalid session IDs #92431
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 9.0.0
  • HashAlgorithmName one-shots #92430
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [browser] move files around #92429
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Move symbols archive out of main intermediate package #92428
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add trim analysis warnings for delegate creation #92427
    area-Meta, linkable-framework
  • [wasm] CI: trigger only wasm jobs when Webcil task has changes #92426
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Ensure that embedded broadcast checks the base type of the parent node #92414
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [H/3] Remove waiting on tasks from H3 request stream dispose #92410
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Convert all remaining tests in the Loader subtree to the merged model #92407
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Clarify MatchAbbreviatedMonthName comment #92405
    area-System.Globalization, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Remove duplicated marshaling of return value for JSExport #92403
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0-rc2' => 'release/8.0' #92401
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, area-codeflow, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Having space in path fails builds #92399
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Fixed containment of STOREIND of HW intrinsics ConvertTo* #92396
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Address feedback and fix some TensorPrimitives issues #92395
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [llvm] Fix the IR generated for returning small valuetypes by value. #92393
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, 9.0.0
  • [NO MERGE] Test removing optimization from `AddDelayFreeUses` #92391
    NO-MERGE, area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • [release/8.0-rc2] Bump downlevel version to 7.0.12 #92419
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Make HostModel PEUtils always read/write little endian #92392
    area-HostModel
  • [release/8.0-rc2] JIT: Fix invalid containment of vector broadcasts #92371
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Fix SIMD+EH check #92348
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] [wasm] Refactor Request Streaming to use HttpContent.CopyToAsync #91699
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Light up BitArray APIs with Vector512 code path #91903
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] Bump version to GA #92305
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • Add missing System.Net.Http.Json comments #92223
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-rc2] [CI][Android] Build mono runtime for Android on PRs #92411
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0-rc1' => 'release/8.0' #92374
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-rc2] [Mono]: Add missing case for constrained gsharedvt call. #92347
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-rc2] Fix the VN for xor operation #92372
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix nativeaot-outerloop yaml #92389
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [CI][Android] Build mono runtime for Android on PRs #91809
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Use FMA in TensorPrimitives.CosineSimilarity #92205
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • Fixes for LLVM AOT on Windows from @lateralusX #92356
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fix some assert's errors for ARM64-LoongArch64-RISCV64. #92319
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Set the HAVE_FUNCTIONAL_PTHREAD_ROBUST_MUTEXES_EXITCOD value to 0 #92324
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv, needs-area-label
  • [release/8.0] Properly handle debugger-enumerating interior pointers and enregistered refs #92360
    Servicing-approved, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-rc2] Fixes for LLVM AOT on Windows from @lateralusX #92365
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [RISC-V] Atomics #92102
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0-rc2' => 'release/8.0' #92325
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 8.0.0
  • Fix error message printed if there's a missing context for get runtime delegate call in hostfxr #92364
    area-Host
  • Disable new tests failing on NativeAOT #92388
    area-System.Linq
  • [mono] Basic SIMD support for System.Numerics.Vector2 on arm64 #91659
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [wasm] [debugger] Evaluation of methods on enums #92263
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Change GetParametersNoCopy to GetParametersAsSpan and use it in a few more places #92310
    area-System.Reflection
  • Build the PGO build legs through the global build job template #92296
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Fixed incorrect reversed condition for GT #92316
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Ensure Bind can handle null from GetSection #92450
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Simplify analyzer handling of properties/events #92449
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [mono][aot] Fix support for files with non-ascii characters on windows #92279
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono][metadata] Fixes for static virtual methods with interface variance #91664
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Remove dependencies on non-live illink #91468
    needs-area-label
  • Build native windows-arm64 Mono cross-compilers #89651
    area-Build-mono
  • Move TargetsCurrent to net9 and add net8 workload #91480
    area-Workloads, 9.0.0
  • Permissive handling for runtimeconfig.json #92037
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Ensure the adapter name 100% matching when parsing proc/net/dev #92187
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Store pinned static fields in the Pinned Object Heap. #89895
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Trim XmlSerializers codegen if unsupported #88796
    area-Serialization, linkable-framework, community-contribution
  • [PERF] Add hybrid globalization testing runs #89825
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Allow multiple post-build steps and allow templated pre and post-build steps #92375
    area-Infrastructure
  • Mark the ILLink test source generator as a source generator #92366
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Adding AVX512 path to Base64 encoding/Decoding #92241
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • JIT: Add support for byte/sbyte SIMD multiplication on XArch #86811
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Make changes nescessary to build IL asm grammar with Bison. #89704
    area-ILTools-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Fix Unnecessary sign-extension for `(nuint)span.Length` #88136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Enable IL trim for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Endian fix for Webcil #92274
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Bring back CopyOutputSymbolsToPublishDirectory #92369
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Unaligned read in ReadUnaligned only when NO_UNALIGNED_ACCESS is set #91813
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Provide ALC name in DispatchProxy for proxies in custom ALC #92385
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • [browser] cleanup for emscripten main in a web worker #92280
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser
  • JIT: Add some convenience classes for node count JIT metrics, and automatic dumping from compShutdown #92112
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid string allocation and improve performance of `JsonProperty.WriteTo` #90074
    area-System.Text.Json, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Add New Test to Track Number of Jitted Methods #91235
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Remove blocking on a test for native AOT #91781
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [JIT] Optimize constant V512 vector with broadcast #92017
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] running tests in a "side car" thread #92226
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Support indexing by array schema #92337
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] Support indexing by value type schema #92334
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono][aot] Type load checks do not fail at compile time but produce a runtime exception #91261
    area-VM-meta-mono, 9.0.0
  • [mono][infra] Disable failing apple mobile tests #92108
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [mono][infra] Use llvm toolchain instead of binutils on linux #92057
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Replace Riscv with RiscV #92318
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Create a managed implementation of assembly binder #91400
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add validation of the runtimeconfig.template.json file #35631
    Backlog
  • Consider enabling esproj support for `dotnet add reference` and `dotnet sln add` #35616
  • Container tooling generates invalid application image when used with an OCI base image #35608
  • `donet watch` fails on rebuilt with locked source generator dll (net8) #35607

Closed

  • dotnet-sdk-7.0 installed - but No SDKs were found. #35617

PullRequests

Created

  • Update RID parsing's `LastIndexOf` call to use invariant culture #35637
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Avoid running new APIs under older TFMs #35636
    Servicing-approved, Area-AspNetCore
  • Fix version of targeting pack #35620
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Containers: support using OCI base images. #35609
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Make NETSDK1083 link to doc #35634
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, 8.0.1xx
  • Rtm Branding #35538
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update dependency names for windows desktop #35623
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update to 9.0 version of targeting pack #35601
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Make NETSDK1083 link to RID doc #35546
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Meaningful error on runtime identifier mismatch in project.assets.json #35491
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2273625 #35586
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Adjust trim/aot warning messages (#35186) #35595
    Servicing-consider, untriaged, Area-ILLink, 8.0.1xx
  • We don't need this 🙃 #35594
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Container Build: Add OCI Archive Format writing #35204
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #35432
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-21
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Collection expressions #5354
    12.0
  • Champion: using aliases for any types #4284
    12.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Minor updates to 2023-09-20 meeting notes #7550

Updated

  • Collection expressions: Update better conversion from expression rule #7547
  • Collection expressions: construction #7541

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Automatic refactoring produces wrong code for async partial void #70063
  • Calls with nullable warning suppressions cannot be intercepted #70061
  • IDE0300 incorrectly suggested for an attribute argument initializer #70058
  • VBCSCompiler doesn't load changed dll referenced as analyzer reference #70053

Closed

  • Make `Covert to raw string` refactoring understand interpolation #65625
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34121.93 #70059
  • Semantic snippets: possible duplication/wrong modifier order after `partial` keyword #69600
    17.8 P4
  • `CS1587` is falsely triggered when XML comments are broken up by preprocessor directives #70057
  • Collection expression with spread element and invalid argument emits `CS1950` #70054
    17.8
  • I've founded a C# code that crashes Visual Studio (and VS Code C# extension) #70027
  • Pattern-based fixed statement behaves inconsistently for nullable value types #66167
    17.8
  • CS0021 error (Cannot apply indexing with [] to an expression of type) appears incorrectly on code that compiles #69663
    17.9
  • NRE from ReceiverIsSubjectToCloning while working in Roslyn.sln #69997
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34120.237 #70052

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert "Merge pull request #69917 from CyrusNajmabadi/sgOOP2" #70065
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Deflect blame away from Roslyn.Utilities.Contract on failures #70064
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove unused member #70062
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Support 'wrapping' for collection expressions. #70060
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add Primary Constructor tests for some scenarios from Test Plan #70056
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Avoid `null` type of pattern expression #70055
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Pattern Matching, untriaged

Merged

  • Add BuildOnlyDiagnosticIds LSP request handler #69475
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Update Razor to 8.0.0-preview.23465.2 #70002
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Update 'convert to raw string' to work with interpolated strings. #70006
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix declaration snippets after `partial` keyword #69874
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Prevent infinite lookup cycle through bases of a containing type of an enum or a delegate type. #70047
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Perform a null check for a pattern-based fixed statement over nullable value type. #69957
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Remove indexer filtering from lookup #69947
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors, Next
  • Handle property without accessors in `Binder.ReceiverIsSubjectToCloning` #70009
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Update Microsoft.DevDiv.Optimization.Data.PowerShell to 1.0803 #70051
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Code Actions - Add fix all support #69853
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: verify element type when reporting conversion error to CollectionBuilder type #69981
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Public API for roslyn features (like CodeActions) to expose the ability to report progress as they run. #50211
    Area-IDE
  • Flip 'pull diagnostics' to be on by default. #70040
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add "Primary Constructors" to Compiler Test Plan.md #70050
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Test MSBuildWorkspace opening `dotnet new` projects. #69225
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Improve GetNextToken / GetPreviousToken perf #69740
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Initial implementation of sub-heading spans (for sticky scroll) #69915
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Updating published Blazor WebAssembly application from .NET 7 to .NET8 preview crashes with: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'dotnet.wasm') #50861
  • Identifying whether the page is server or client for RenderMode.Auto #50859
  • AuthenticationState should detect changes to cookie states outside Context #50858
  • Blazor ServiceWorkerAssetsManifest Missing Scoped Css for Wasm Client #50856

Closed

  • Perf regression: ApiCrudDeleteProduct #50795
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudDeleteProduct #50807
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps, https #50793
  • Perf regression: fortunes #50857
  • ViewBag not working in .net8 preview 7 #50084
  • SSR and Fetch with Azure Front Door #50587
  • Perf regression: mapaction #50847
  • Render Mode : Auto and Webassembly shows an error, render mode server works fine #50754
    .NET 9 Planning
  • oli.luwan@hotmail.com. #50853
  • Can't find the {project}.styles.css file, when using the Blazor Web App template create a .Net 8.0 (preview) application. #50473
  • During shutdown of the ASP.NET host, configuration values cannot be resolved anymore #50570
  • WebApplicationFactory disposes host before StopAsync on background service is called #50622

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid re-running routing for implicit middlewares and remove implicit anti-forgery #50864
    area-middleware
  • [Blazor] Initializers fixes for Blazor Web #50860
    area-blazor
  • Update editorconfig with naming rules #50854
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix Http/3 tests #50852
    area-networking

Merged

  • Fix http2cat sample #50863
    area-networking, 9.0-preview1
  • [release/8.0-rc2] [Blazor] Make auto components prefer the existing render mode #50851
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 8.0-rc2
  • Quarantine CanLaunchPhotinoWebViewAndClickButton #50803
    area-blazor, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Add Identity Components to Blazor template #50722
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc
  • [release/8.0-rc2] [Blazor] Improvements to SSR component activation #50848
    area-blazor
  • Avoid excessive WellKnownType cache misses in RDG #50669
    pending-ci-rerun, feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2273349 #50824
    area-mvc
  • Implement IDirectoryContents on ManifestDirectoryInfo #50586
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-ui-rendering
  • Dispose secret instances #50675
    area-dataprotection, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0-rc2' => 'release/8.0' #50845
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • [release/8.0] Update SDK version #50734
    area-infrastructure
  • Fix blocking call in FindByEmailAsync #50603
    area-identity, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-21
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Unable to use dotnet-trace from sidecar on Azure Container Instances. #4217

PullRequests

Merged

  • [RISC-V] Set the HAVE_FUNCTIONAL_PTHREAD_ROBUST_MUTEXES_EXITCOD value to 0 in RISCV64 #4249

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RC1 File/New MAUI Blazor Hybrid gets several MA002 warnings about UseMaui and SkipValidateMauiImplicitPackageReferences #17561
  • Image Border clipping incorrect on Mac/iOS #17560
  • iOS Keyboard Scrolling UITesting #17559
  • How are we doing in the repo? -- spot check #17556
  • [Android] DragGestureRecognizer.DropCompleted event not firing #17554
  • Changing Shell.NavBarIsVisible does not update the nav bar on Mac / iOS #17550
  • [Android] David's Control Gallery Crashes on Rotation of initial screen #17549
  • [Recipes] On rotation the CarouselView for My Recipes doesn't resize the content #17548
  • [Android] Border default background is black #17547
  • macOS / VSCode - Not compiling anymore #17541

Closed

  • Error thrown when accessing resource values with OnPlatform from Resource Dictionary #16494
  • [regression/8.0.0-rc.1.9171] SwipeView Execute mode does not work when using Binding Command #17371
    .NET 8 GA
  • Button stops responding on clicks after switching Command by DataTrigger #17344
  • Abysmal performance in Interop on iOS #17516
  • [MacCatalyst] Poor scroll performance in MAUI ListView #12388
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • Cannot directly type culture (e.g. 'en-US') for a CultureInfo property in .NET MAUI XAML #17146
  • blazor hybrid blazorwebview mixed mode http content and untrusted ssl certificate problem #17219
  • .NET 8 iOS Release build very slow #17339

PullRequests

Created

  • Update SkiaSharp to the latest stable version #17558
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #17557
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fixed Android's Border background to use a Transparent bg if not othe… #17555
    area/controls 🎮

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Native AOT - Microsoft.Data.SQLite - Statically Link / self contained EXE #31829
  • Compiled model with enum member "Cannot access private method 'ConvertToEnum'" #31827

Closed

  • Should I be able to use the EF Core tools to apply migrations when using an interceptor to set my connection string #31055
  • ef migration work on windows but not working on linux #31826
  • Cannot generate compiled model with an enum using RC1 #31821

PullRequests

Created

  • [TEST ONLY] Adding query test suite for optional dependent. #31830
  • Queries for struct complex types #31828

Merged

  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.OData from 8.2.2 to 8.2.3 #31687
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Created
